mapper.select: CREATE TABLE `table_name` ( `time` datetime NOT NULL, `id_device` int(11) NOT NULL, `error` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `low_alarm` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `high_alarm` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
